metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6472 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A packet containing a malformed DUID can cause the Kea DHCPv6 server process (kea-dhcp6) to exit due to an assertion failure. Versions affected: 1.4.0 to 1.5.0, 1.6.0-beta1, and 1.6.0-beta2.

criterions.comment: isc-kea package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
